description.value:
Requirements A creature within your reach is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Prone] or swimming.

You summon the explosive power of a geyser beneath a foe. The required creature must attempt a @Check[fortitude|against:class] save against your class DC as elemental water confounds their senses; if the creature is prone, they can Stand as a free action.

Critical Success The target is unaffected.

Success The target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Sickened]{Sickened 1}.

Failure The target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Sickened]{Sickened 2}. If you have a free hand and they are not larger than you, you can attempt an Athletics check to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Grapple] them as a free action.

Critical Failure As failure, but if you succeed at the Athletics check to Grapple them, you get a critical success instead.
